name: Nike
description: Nike offer a wide selection of shoes that meet the needs of such a wide range of runners.

name: Adidas
description: Adidas sneakers are known for their comfortable fit, excellent cushioning, and durable materials, notes Williams.

name: Converse
description: but it’s a basic canvas sneaker that’s well done. If you wear it every day, I’d bet you’d get a full year out of them.
